name: Bump Snail (First Draft)
description:
Enter the world of strategic snail-bumping battles in our latest game, Bump Snail! In this exciting mash-up of the popular games, you'll build your own deck of powerful snail characters, each with unique abilities and strengths, and pit them against other players in real-time multiplayer battles.

Gather experiences, upgrade your deck, and develop your own tactics to outwit and outplay your opponents. Use your snail's skills to defend your territory and attack your enemy's farm. But watch out - your opponents will be doing the same to you!

With stunning graphics and easy-to-learn gameplay, Bump Snail is the perfect blend of strategy and excitement for both casual and hardcore gamers alike. Join the flock and become the ultimate snail-bumping champion!
